Description: Mould-made pottery lamp with a heart-shaped nozzle and a plain discus. The shoulder is decorated with ovules. Within the narrow base-ring is the name STROBILI in relief. Covered with a red to brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2013)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine (trustees)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Sir Henry Solomon Wellcome
